metadata.name: Multiverse #1
metadata.description:
The Lost Clod 049 is the first musical clod. It’s created in collaboration with Andrea Mosca (aka Andrew0) and is inspired to the old video games, using pixel art and vintage audio.

The Lost Clods are about people who didn’t survive the destruction of the planet. For different reasons they couldn’t make it or couldn’t manage to create a new life for themselves.

The audio follows the arcade, pixel style of the pictures, and tries to create sounds which recall the old-style, 8bit audio of the old videogames, but with a more modern taste and technology.

The tracks show up in this order: object, tree, sky, people, clod, grass.

Object is usually a sound fx, tree is a melodic arpeggio or phrase, sky is a soft pad sound, people is a melody, clod is a rhythmic element, divided into two secions and grass is a secondary arp or melody.
